EmailTemplate.name: CSO Messages.Redmond CSO Transition Go Live - BGA-DS
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Redmond Order Management Transitions to Infosys
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Customer,
In December, we shared with you our plans to transition our Order Management activities from the Redmond, Washington, site to our new partner, Infosys. We are happy to announce that we are on track for the transition. Just a quick reminder:
- All Redmond orders, quotes and status activities will be managed by the Infosys CSR team.
- For processing orders, requesting order status, and order expedites and deliveries, you will contact Orders@Honeywell.com <mailto:orders@honeywell.com>
- For quote requests and quote status, you will contact Quotes@Honeywell.com <mailto:quotes@honeywell.com>
- For all Aircraft on Ground (AOG) issues, please contact the Honeywell AOG Team at 1-800-601-3099 (US/Canada) or 1-602-365-3099 (International), select phone option #4.
- For Product Support, please email AeroTechSupport@Honeywell.com <mailto:aerotechsupport@honeywell.com> or call 1-855-808-6500 (US/Canada) or 1-602-365-6500 (International).
Yours Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace
